decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Flood Risk Assessment received: 29 March 2017. Site Plan received: 29 March 2017. ALWA-131 (Existing) and ALWA-132 (Existing) received: 20 April 2017. ALWA-136 and ALWA-1381 received 23 June 2017. ALWA-131 (Proposed) and ALWA-132 (Proposed) received: 30 June 2017. ALWA-130, ALWA-130R, ALWA-1301, and ALWA-1351 received: 6 July 2017. ALWA-1371 received 7 July 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The basement shall not be converted into a separate dwelling or for the use as sleeping accommodation.

Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - No excavation or construction work shall be undertaken prior to the submission and approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority, of a Construction Method Statement, which is certified by a qualified professional giving details of excavation, temporary works and construction techniques, including details of potential impacts on neighbouring land based on assessment of the geology and hydrology of the area.

Condition : 8 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
description: Creation of a basement and erection of a single storey rear extension to the house.
